thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com | 3 of 113
thread.title: Ronald Abe
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Ronald Abe

author: Ronald Abe
title: Ronald Abe
text: My son recommended Eagle Optics for the purchase of a spotting scope from his prior experience with the company. I called and was provided sound advice in choosing a scope that fit my needs. The price was competitive and shipment tracking was excellent. The entire experience was exceptional.
